池上.definition: Chihshang or Chihshang township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

池上鄉.definition: Chishang or Chihshang township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

池子.definition: pond; bathhouse pool; dance floor of a ballroom; (old) stalls (front rows in a theater)

池州市.definition: Chizhou, prefecture-level city in Anhui Province 安徽省[An1hui1 Sheng3]

池鷺.definition: (bird species of China) Chinese pond heron (Ardeola bacchus)
